        Registers a user.

      • validateLogin

        public boolean validateLogin(String username,
                    String password)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Validates a login.
        Parameters:
        username - username to validate
        password - password to validate
        Returns:
        true if login was successful otherwise false.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when the encryption phase in the model was invalid.

      • validateRegistration

        Validates a registration by checking if the username is available.
        Parameters:
        username - username to check
        Returns:
        true if the username is free, otherwise false.

      • createPDF

        public void createPDF(Application application)
               throws IOException,
                      com.lowagie.text.DocumentException
        Creates a PDF-file of some application.
        Parameters:
        application - application to create the pdf-file from.
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException thrown when the specified URL cannot be found for the redirection.
        com.lowagie.text.DocumentException - Thrown when a error occurs in the creation of the pdf document.
